Cell.Data: The DEV TEAM / MISC NOTES column contains info on what text between { } signs means (if applicable). It usually stands for either a numeric value, or a numeric value with an icon. Text between [ ] signs stands for a certain type of icon.

{XML_SPECIES_SYNDICATE@RACE@DESCRIPTION_SHORT}[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet][sand]Starting Bonus:[/sand] Start with 25[influence/] [hyperlink,000003AC0000001B]Influence[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet][sand]Long-Term Bonus:[/sand] +1 [hyperlink,0000039F000024DA]Doctrine Slot[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,0000039E0000000D]Arc[/hyperlink] Weapons Groups[/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,0000039E00000011]Psi[/hyperlink] Weapons Groups[/bullet][bullet]Indentured slave units ignore morale penalties[/bullet][bullet]Excellent stealth capabilities and covert operations[/bullet][/bulletList]

{XML_SPECIES_SYNDICATE@RACE@DESCRIPTION_SHORT}[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet][sand]初始加成：[/sand]开始时拥有 25[influence/] [hyperlink,000003AC0000001B]影响力[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet][sand]长期加成：[/sand]+1[hyperlink,0000039F000024DA]教义槽位[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,0000039E0000000D]电弧[/hyperlink]武器组[/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,0000039E00000011]灵能[/hyperlink]武器组[/bullet][bullet]契约奴仆单位无视士气惩罚[/bullet][bullet]优秀的潜行能力，擅长隐秘行动[/bullet][/bulletList]
The {text} inserts the DESCRIPTION_SHORT text below.
The [hyperlink,0000039E0000001B]Syndicate[/hyperlink] are a group of ruthless trading Houses from the frontiers of the Empire. With the Star Union gone, they see a universe of opportunity.
[hyperlink,0000039E0000001B]辛迪加[/hyperlink]是位于帝国边缘的一伙贸易家族联合体。当星际联盟陨落之后，他们看到了宇宙中的无限可能。
A settlement is a small independent colony that might join you if you have enough influence.
定居点是小型的独立殖民地，如果你拥有足够的影响力，定居点可能会加入你的势力。

Migrate the population of this colony to Syndicate The colony will become an Syndicate colony.[br/][br/][fireCol]By migrating the population, {PopulationDeath} of the colonists of the colony will be killed.[/fireCol] [br/][br/]You receive:[br/][fireCol]{Reputation} Reputation[br/]{RaceRelation} Race Relation with the {STR_raceName}[/fireCol]
将殖民地的居民移民为辛迪加，之后该殖民地将变为辛迪加殖民地。[br/][br/][fireCol]迁移人口后，该殖民地 {PopulationDeath} 的移住民将会死亡。[/fireCol][br/][br/]你获得：[br/][fireCol]{Reputation} 声望[br/]与{STR_raceName}的种族关系 {RaceRelation}[/fireCol]
Colony is currently being migrated to an Syndicate population. Process will complete in [INT_duration].
殖民地正迁移为辛迪加殖民地，将于 [INT_duration] 后完成。
Are you sure you want to migrate this colony to an Syndicate colony?
确定要将该殖民地变更为辛迪加殖民地？

“With anti-gravity boots, a scout like me can earn a decent wage in the service of the family. I try to steer clear of conflicts. I’ve no gift for Psi-tech. I don’t have the tech for heavy battles, but what’s the harm in sharing a little information for the thrill of speeding over water and land alike? Slavery. Corruption. Smuggling. Sure, the Syndicate has its questionable parts, but what doesn’t have its questionable parts these days? We do what we can to survive. It beats starving. It’s a living.”—Manti Yed, “RV-00098A: Come Fly with the Runners”
“在反重力战靴的帮助下，像我这样的哨兵也能在家族的事务中获得一份丰厚的报酬。我的任务就是避免与敌人发生冲突。我在灵能方面没有天赋，也不擅长重火力作战，但一边在山水之间穿梭，一边获取情报的生活有什么不好？贩卖奴隶、贿赂、走私，没错，辛迪加的确有着不光彩的一面，但当今世道下，有谁真的干净呢？我们所做的一切都是为了活下去，为了吃饱，为了穿暖。”- 曼迪·耶德，“RV-00098A：与走私者一起飞翔”

“The Narkuu Family purchased my family’s debt. It originated from my great grandfather. When he failed to profit from the venture, the debts fell into collection for up to five generations. That’s the terms. I pay it off through indentured servitude. I do what they want. Fight or die. I belong to the owner. Many folks lost their livelihoods when the bloody Star Union crashed. I don’t blame anybody really. I live, many didn’t survive. So that’s that. I’ll do whatever it takes to pay down the principal—even wield a gun.”—Xircon Marq, “RV-3499F: Memoir of one Indentured”
“纳库家族帮助我还清了家族的欠款，我的曾祖父当年生意失败，欠下的债款积累至今已经五代了。而我，以签约奴役的方式将它还清了。我会完全遵从他们的指示，无论是战斗还是死亡。我属于我的主人。当星际联盟倒塌时，许多人失去了生命。我不怨恨任何人，因为我还活着，许多人连活着的机会都没有。所以，我会为了还清债务不择手段，包括拿起枪支。”- 希尔肯·马克，“RV-3499F：契约者的回忆录”

“The protestors were fools. Syndicate noble-merchants all have money and power. A bunch of shouting people won’t change that. Who fights the Syndicate Enforcers expecting to get away without some kind of injury? Each punch with their Psi-powered gauntlet is the equivalent force of being beaten by an angry mob. Their Psi-tech weaponry can create shields and if things get out of control, inflicts crippling wounds on the unruliest dissidents. In the Syndicate, if you want a long life, you should lay low, keep quiet, and obey.”—Nozefur Aatu, Propagandist, “RV-9527H: Revisions of Syndicate History”
“那群抗议的人都是蠢货。辛迪加那些贵族商人有权有势，一群乱喊乱叫的人什么也改变不了。敢于辛迪加执行者作对的人，哪个有好果子吃？以灵能驱动的手套发出的每一次攻击都堪比一个愤怒的暴民，而且这种灵能武器还能生成护盾。如果事态失控，这群不守规矩的反抗者一定非死即残。在辛迪加，想活得久，就保持低调，乖乖听话。”- 诺兹弗尔·阿图，宣传者，“RV-9527H：重温辛迪加历史”

“If I had to choose order or profits, I’d choose profits. Profitability is paramount. Order is something you purchase with sufficient profit. As an Overseer, I can unlock a man’s profitability. Developers, engineers and tech workers are paid to do their job, but even the best worker is but a resource to be used. Their lives don’t matter unless they produce a profit. It is the nature of the common worker to be undisciplined. With the Psi-tech powers I’ve mastered, I inspire discipline. Indentured are my best tools. For me, they fight even when exhausted.”—Valorix S’nau, “RV-9000F: Horde Management”

“如果非要在秩序与利益中做出选择，我会选择利益。利益是至上的，秩序可以靠足够的利益得到。作为监管者，我掌管着人们的利益。开发者、工程师、技术工人都是具有价值的工人，但再怎么优秀的工人也不过是一种被使用的资源。他们的生命只有在产出价值时才有意义。这就是普通工人没有组织纪律的原因。只要使用掌握的灵能力量，我就能创造几率。契约者就是我最优秀的工具，即使筋疲力竭，他们依然会为我而战。”- 瓦洛利克斯·斯诺，“RV-9000F：群体管理”

“My skillset is purchased to maintain decorum in the highest echelons of the Syndicate aristocracy. The rich and powerful must always appear to have control, following their own exclusive code of dignity. They abhor open acts of aggression, demanding balance and stability. If one gains too much power too quickly, gives too generous a gift, threatens the wrong house, or even marries the wrong person, they risk discrete and decisive assassination. It’s the assassin’s guild that is entrusted with deadly secrets and weaknesses to sabotage even the most powerful enemies. Knowledge truly is power.”—Sir Hao Pearce, “RV-88434A, Assassin’s Credo”
“我的职责就是维护辛迪加贵族中上层梯队们的体面。有权有势的人一般会有强烈的控制欲，以及特有的尊严观念。他们厌恶侵略，主张平衡与安定。如果一方的势力增长过快、给予赠礼的数量过多、威胁了错误的家族、甚至嫁错了人，他们都会不顾团结，进行刺杀。无论目标多么强大，刺客公会都掌握有可以利用的秘密与弱点。知识真的就是力量。”- 豪·皮尔斯长官，“RV-88434A，刺客信条”

“As we traveled closer to our destination, the road just seemed to disappear. Out of the obstacles came brigands demanding a tribute. They accomplished their trickery using a strange aircraft that could project mental images to confuse and disorient the caravan guardians. I didn’t understand at the time, but rogue agents had commandeered a Syndicate Mirage aircraft, using it to blast us with psionic energy. I lost track of the caravan as a wave of mind-bending energy convinced me I was being attacked by a giant muffin. I now realize that I was hallucinating.”—Mah Reg’Nib, “RV-8576X: Syndication Vindication”
“当我们距离目的地越来越近时，道路突然消失了。一伙劫匪从旁边的障碍物中杀出。他们使用了一种能够生成幻象的飞行器成功扰乱了车队护卫们的心神。我还没有反应过来，就被敌人操纵的辛迪加幻象飞行器发射的灵能力量击中了。在连续不断的精神攻击下，车队在我眼前消失了，我亲眼看到自己正在被一个巨大的松饼攻击着。直到现在我才意识到，那不过是幻觉。”- 玛·瑞格尼布，“RV-8576X：辛迪加辩白”

“As the enraged mob rushed the palace gates, a Syndicate Wraith tank materialized in their midst. All around it, angry people fell, clawing their skulls. The tank’s gun rippled with a cone of destructive mind-altering energy. Hundreds of civilians collapsed. The tank’s gravity engines crushed any obstacle caught beneath it. Those with sense ran for their lives. It seems cruel to inflict so many civilian casualties. If they survived, they would have brain damage. We should acknowledge this as a feature. Brain damage pacifies dissident civilians.”—Su Mon Li, Syndicate Subjugator, “RV-5699M: Maximum Effectiveness & Order”

“当怒火中烧的人群冲向宫殿的大门时，一辆辛迪加幽灵坦克突然出现在他们中间，它发射出了一种能够改变心智的能量，使得周围愤怒的人群悉数挠着头倒下，数百名平民也受到了牵连。它的中立引擎将一切障碍物碾成了齑粉。尚且保有理智的人立刻四散而逃。不得不说，牵连的平民未免有些过多，就算他们能够活下来，脑部也会留下创伤。但这应该也算一件好事，因为脑部受损会令暴民平和下来。”- 李苏萌，辛迪加征服者，“RV-5699M：最大效率与秩序”

“You don’t just walk into a Syndicate Vault and help yourself with their most precious treasures. This is no market place. We’ve been assigned to infiltrate the most complex security in the known universe. Proximity quantum phase locks, psi-tech mind scramblers, and holographic portals are standard issue, but the most terrible is the Syndicate Sentinel. It floats high, with a full 360 degrees defensive overwatch. It can phase into and out of locations with ease. Armed with a heavy pulse cannon and pulse lance, the Syndicate executes justice with impunity.”—Chemish Abbadon, “RV-6554F: Escapades in Stealth”
“你不能直接走进一个辛迪加宝库，然后想拿什么宝物就拿什么，这里可不是市场。我们的任务是潜入已知宇宙中最负责的安保系统，近量子相位锁、灵能思维扰乱装置、全息传送门不过是开胃小菜，最难缠的就是辛迪加哨兵。它在空中漂浮，进行着 360 度无死角监视。能够以相位传送的方式进行快速移动。装备有重型脉冲加农炮和脉冲长矛，辛迪加在贯彻正义方面还真是不遗余力。”- 切米什·阿巴顿，“RV-6554F：潜入行为”

“I was supposed to clean Subjugator Toh-Toh’s hoverchair while he got a snack. Maybe it’s my bad luck, but the chair floated up and the Psionic control orbs activated. Poor Toh-Toh came running just as the Psi-tech repeaters suddenly started firing. More than meatballs and marinara sauce splattered everywhere. I’d seen the Reanimation Collars completely revive a fallen Indentured, so I tried to use it on Toh-Toh’s remains, but I mistakenly pressed the Agony Field projector. The hangar guards around the chair screamed, blood spurted from their eyes. It only got worse from there.”[br/]—Mah Reg’Nib, “RV-8577X: Syndication Vindication[br/]

“我曾经的任务是在征服者托托吃点心的时候清理他的悬浮椅。或许是因为我运气不太好，椅子浮了起来，灵能控制宝珠也被激活了。可怜的托托在跑过来的时候被突然走火的灵能机枪击中，被打成了一滩散落在各处的肉泥。我知道重生颈圈能够复活一名死去的契约者，所以我打算将它用在托托的遗体上，但我却不小心按下了痛苦力场发射器的按钮。围绕在椅子周围的机库守卫尖叫着，鲜血从眼睛喷涌而出，情况更糟了。”[br/]- 玛·瑞格尼布，“RV-8577X：辛迪加辩白”[br/]

“Although it looks spacious, much of the Zenith’s hold space is occupied with Psi-tech powerpacks to charge its Pulse Turrets. The whole bow of this floating warship conceals the huge Cataclysm Cannon. Forget about cover if that hidden cannon is ever discharged at you. It is often documented how Syndicate troops seem to have high morale as the monstrous cannon rolls by. Even the look of it instills a profound sense of confidence.”—Mah Reg’Nib, “RV-8578X: Syndication Vindication
“尽管它看起来非常宽敞，但尖峰号的内部空间大部分被灵能背包占据，用于为脉冲炮塔充能。战船的船头隐藏有一门灾难大炮隐藏在船头之中。如果被它锁定，任何掩体都无济于事。有记载称，当这门怪物一般的大炮开始射击时，辛迪加部队的士气就会高涨，尽管给予他人信心并不是它的设计初衷。”- “RV-8578X：辛迪加辩白”

“I knew entering Syndicate waters would be risky. These masters of surveillance intercepted us with a blockade of Guild Cruisers. Captain Televant tried claiming diplomatic immunity. They trained their Pulse Repeaters on our ship and explained that by entering their domain, we had joined the Guild. They demanded we pay dues for the ‘benefit’ of membership. I tried to explain that losing half our cargo was cheaper than our lives. The Captain tried to bargain… quite aggressively. That’s when he ‘fell’ into the sea. I was promoted by the Syndicate to captain.”—Captain Lars Sitwell, “RV-44499D: Trade Routes”

“我知道进入辛迪加的水域非常危险。这群监视专家用公会巡洋舰拦住了我们的去路。特莱温特队长尝试使用自己的外交豁免权。他们将脉冲连发枪部署在我们的船上，并向我们解释道，我们进入了这片水域，就代表着我们加入了公会，我们必须缴纳会费。我试图向他们解释，比起失去半数货物，我们更想活命。队长试图进行讨价还价......而且态度非常激进。也就是在这时，他‘掉入’了海中，我被辛迪加提拔为了队长。”- 拉尔斯·希特威尔队长，“RV-44499D：贸易路线”

“The Hoverbike whizzed smoothly across the Pitted Plains. The psion-pistons kept the light craft anticipating and correcting for any uneven impediments in my path. I knew I’d have to get to the slave auction before Toh-Toh or my true love would spend the rest of her days in his slave collar. I zipped up to the auction block just in time to place the winning bid and declare my love for Lol Inx Ahn Kah by attaching my own slave collar to her. #BestWifeEver”—Tor Val Lor Dok, “RV-10053E: True Syndicate Romance”
“悬浮机车在坑洼平原呼啸而过。装备的灵能活塞使得这辆轻型载具能够跨过眼前的所有障碍。我知道我必须在托托或我的真爱在被奴役中度过余生之前到达奴隶拍卖会。我及时到达了拍卖会现场并拿下了竞拍，以将奴隶项圈套在她的脖子上的方式表达了自己对洛儿因克斯·安卡哈的爱。#最棒的妻子”- 托瓦尔·洛多克，“RV-10053E：真正的辛迪加罗曼史”
Suppressor towers are the Syndicate defense turrets.
镇压者高塔是辛迪加防御塔。

Salutations, scion of the Syndicate. Your ancestors led the earliest conquest of space, gathering fortunes and establishing aristocratic houses across the galaxy. Despite having to submit to the Star Union, wealth, influence and a caste of servants have followed your houses to this day. Nobility brings obligations - don’t let the collapse of the Union turn you into a petty robber baron. Restore this planet to civilization.
你好，辛迪加的子弟。你的先祖曾是最早的太空征服领导者，在宇宙各处大肆敛财，建立贵族家族。尽管你们曾向星际联盟俯首称臣，但财富、影响力以及拥有的仆人数量使你们时至今日依然在蓬勃发展。高贵的品质必须肩负责任，希望星际联盟的倒塌不会使你们变成一伙强盗。恢复这颗星球的文明吧。

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
